title: Fullstack Blog Platform
description:
A modern, **full-featured** blogging system with full-text search and a **custom authentication system** built from scratch. Includes:
- A modular backend built with **Node.js**, **PostgreSQL**, **Zod**, and **Meilisearch**
- A reactive frontend built with **React**, **Tailwind CSS**, **Zustand**, **Shadcn UI**, and **Motion Framer**

title: Async Job System in Go
description:
A lightweight async job system written in **Go**, used across my projects to handle background tasks through **Redis** queues.
- In the blog platform, it updates **Meilisearch** indexes without blocking the main app
- it buffers inference requests via a **queue** to prevent **concurrency** issues caused by high memory usage during model execution

title: Interactive Particle Field
description:
A simple particle toy built with **Three.js** and **React Three Fiber**, inspired by my earlier ray tracing project **mini-rt** at Hive Helsinki.
- Uses **instanced meshes** to efficiently render 2000+ rotating particles
- Global rotation responds to mouse position via `useFrame`
- Modularly designed for future expansion into a fullscreen reactive visual layer
